summary:
In this talk I'll walk through some highlights of SQLAlchemy internal
design and methodology, based on the upcoming chapter for the
"Architecture of Open Source Applications" book. We'll have a little bit
of SQLAlchemy philosophy, an overview of the Core, and then a 500-ft
view of how the ORM goes about things, with plenty of cool looking
diagrams.
title: PyGotham 2011: SQLAlchemy, an Architectural Retrospective
